title: SBT PRBLMS: Law Enforcement Issues Put SBT GRVL’s Future in Question
content:
After county commissioners said that SBT GRVL had to reduce participation by more than 40 percent and change the format from a race to a ride, organizers are pivoting to keep the event alive.

Read the full article at SBT PRBLMS: Law Enforcement Issues Put SBT GRVL’s Future in Question on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
